ygData.subject: A Question for Higher Levels
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail, I m a 21st level Barbarian Warrior on Rallos Zek.  Currently I dual wield polished granite tomahawk axes (don t ask about how long it took me, or how
ygData.messageBody:
Hail, I'm a 21st level Barbarian Warrior on Rallos Zek. Currently I dual wield polished granite tomahawk axes (don't ask about how long it took me, or how many fools try to take them away) and can safely say they kick so much ass. How else can a Warrior steal kills from a Caster??? Anyway, I currently only have ringmail and some banded for armor and what I really want is plate. Bronze plate I hear is fairly reasonable, though heavy, which shouldn't be a problem with my high Strength. Does anyone know where the best place to acquire Medium sized Bronze plate is? I've got my weapons, and now I need to beef up my armor.

Odhinn MacDoughl
Skald, Hand of Tyr
